concept.title: Configuring resource adapter for
concept.shortdesc: To configure the resource adapter for , you must define a number of JCA resources.

conbody.p: You can define these JCA resources in the following categories:

ul.li: The properties of the ResourceAdapter object, which represent the global properties of the resource adapter, such as the level of diagnostic tracing. These properties are described in .

The properties of an ActivationSpec object, which determine how an MDB is activated for inbound communication. These properties are described in Configuring the resource adapter for inbound communication.

The properties of a ConnectionFactory object, which the uses to create a JMS ConnectionFactory object for outbound communication. These properties are described in Configuring the resource adapter for outbound communication.
The properties of an administered destination object, which the uses to create destination objects for inbound or outbound communication. These properties are described in .

conbody.p: The resource adapter logs, warning, and error messages for are automatically redirected to the application server output log.

For information about installing and configuring applications that use these configuration objects on a , see Installing enterprise application files and Installing enterprise application files with the console in the documentation.
